## Background
The code documents and illustrates the steps from data to type division
along a local environmental complex variable (LEC).


### Packages and source files
```{r, message=FALSE}
library(raster)
library(fields)
library(vegan)

source("../R/typification_functions.r")
```


### Simulating species
```{r}
## Generating simulate species
sim_species <- sim.sp()

## Plotting simulated species densities
sp.col <- tim.colors(n = ncol(sim_species$sp_abun))
matplot(sim_species$sp_abun,
        type = "l",
        lty = 1,
        col = sp.col,
        xaxt = "n",
        yaxt = "n",
        ylim = c(0, 1.2 * max(sim_species$sp_abun)),
        xlab = "Key source of variation (local complex-variable",
        ylab = "Key characteristic")
```
